events.name: GCDC Ahmedabad Launch Party  & Cloud Study Jam on Kubernetes
events.description:
Howdy!

We're happy to announce the official launch of Google Cloud Developer Community, Ahmedabad.

Join us for our fun filled Launch Party and Study Jam session on 23rd February, 2019.

Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!
Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning.
Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete any labs you want

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.

Registration Link: https://goo.gl/forms/XNlDJ1AeyDl4Dq9B3

events.name: Tensorflow Dev Summit 2019 Viewing Party
events.description:
TensorFlow Dev Summit brings together a diverse mix of machine learning users from around the world for two days of highly technical talks, demos, and conversation with the TensorFlow team and community.
It is no question that machine learning is one of the hottest and one of the most important technology topics for developers and we think you can use this as an opportunity to build local machine learning community or engage with your local machine learning users!

Website: https://www.tensorflow.org/dev-summit/

events.name: GCDC Ahmedabad Google Cloud Study Jam on Machine Learning
events.description:
Howdy!

We're happy to announce the second Google Cloud study Jam by GCDC Ahmedabad.

Join us for our fun-filled Study Jam session on 13th April 2019.

Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!
Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning.
Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete with any labs you want.

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.

Registration link: https://goo.gl/heB5sJ

events.name: Firebase Roadshow Ahmedabad Edition

venue.name: Knowledge Consortium Of Gujarat
venue.address_1: SSIP IHub, KCG Campus, Opp.PRL, Near L.D College of Engineering, Navrangpura, Ahmedabad

events.description:
# Firebase Roadshow Ahmedabad Edition

Your chance to interact with Firebase Global Engineering Team, right here in Ahmedabad! Learn about the wide array of use cases it covers, ask questions and discusses everything Firebase. Join us on 30 June 2019 at SSIP I-Hub for Firebase Roadshow, Ahmedabad. Register now - https://bit.ly/2KM8Kcb Limited seats only!

The engineering team behind Firebase, one of the most popular mobile/web app dev platforms is traveling to India. They will talk about how to do data modeling, crash analysis & prevention, predictions, user retention/engagement and more by using new features in Firebase.

When & Where

Roadshows are limited capacity, day-long conferences with multiple sessions by the engineering team that includes live coding and sharing of best practices.

Date - Sunday, 30th June 2019
Time - 10 AM to 5 PM
Address: SSIP IHub, KCG Campus, Opp.PRL, Near L.D College of Engineering, Navrangpura, Ahmedabad · Ahmedabad

events.name: Cloud Study Jam - Kubernetes
events.description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!

Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with Kubernetes.

Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete in any labs you want.

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.

Mentor: Jimish Parekh ( Full Stack Engineer & Founder of Pedals Up)

Registration Form link: https://bit.ly/2KFqLZe

Note: Registration is required to attend cloud study jam.

events.name: Live Streaming of the Google Cloud OnBoard Big Data & Machine Learning

venue.name: Silver Oak College
venue.address_1: Millennium Hall, 3rd Floor, B Block, Silver Oak College of Engineering and Technology, Ahmedabad

events.description:
Cloud OnBoard is a free instructor-led training event that will provide you with a technical introduction to the Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Through a combination of instructor-led presentations and technical demonstrations, you will learn how to get started with cloud concepts such as virtual machines, containers, applications, big data, and machine learning.

you can go and learn more https://inthecloud.withgoogle.com/onboard/global.html

events.name: TensorFlow All-Around - Ahmedabad

venue.name: The Address
venue.address_1: West Gate, 22nd Floor, YMCA Club Road, Near YMCA Club, SG Highway, 18th floor, 22nd floor,

events.description:
Join us for the TensorFlow All-Around Ahmedabad event and get hands-on experience with TensorFlow together!

After this event, you can keep developing your skills at home by completing all the recommended codelab, tutorials, and videos.

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! For the best experience, make sure your laptop has installed Python dev environment, your favorite editor (e.g., Visual Studio Code), or latest browser for using online codelab environment. Don’t forget your charger.

Our First Speaker: Charmi

Let's talk TF: TensorFlow from T to F!

Whether creating an ML-based Binary classification Model or a DL based Deep Neural Network, TF is the one which comes at your rescue! If you wish to get started with TensorFlow, an open-source AI framework for fast numerical computing, join us at this interactive session will seek answers to the questions, "What is TensorFlow?", "Why should one use it?", and "How does it work?" with live demos.

Second Speaker: Zaid Kesarani

Exploring Google Cloud for Machine Learning and Data Science:
Why Google Cloud?
Intro to Google's Pre-Trained ML Models
Google Cloud Datalab
Google Managed Services for AI
Google BigQuery
Google Dataproc

Attended. Learn. Network. Repeat.

Registration Form: shorturl.at/wxFQU
events.how_to_find_us: Block - B, 18th Floor, Training Room, The Address

events.name: Ahmedabad University MLH Local Hackday 2019
events.description:
MLH's Local Hack Day is a series of simultaneous global events designed to spark a passion for technology in your local community. Spend the day getting hands-on experience and collaborating in a welcoming environment at a local event. Whether you are learning to code or are an expert hacker, Local Hack Day is perfect for you and your community. Learn new skills, build new projects, and share your creations at a Local Hack Day near you.

This year we are doing things differently. You can now host a conference, a hack day, and a demo day for your community. We are focusing on the three important skills - Learning, Building, and Sharing.

Registration Process is different first you need to go to MLH Website registration link https://organize.mlh.io/participants/events/1651-learn-day
then, after you have to fill-up a google form
link https://bit.ly/2lY3WWA with same mail id you register at MLH website.

upcoming.name: Google Cloud Community Day Ahmedabad

venue.name: Knowledge Consortium Of Gujarat
venue.address_1: Between Govt. Girls Polytechnic and L.D College of Engineering, Navrangpura

upcoming.description:
Hello, we are hosting our annual event "Google Cloud community Day" on 7th December and welcome all passionate developers interested to know the power of Cloud and how they can use it. We will have an amazing lineup of speakers featuring developer advocates, customer engineers, and architects from Google, Google Developer Experts and prominent developers and customers speaking how they use GCP.

The content would be technical featuring deep dives into specific technologies and use cases. Please register by filling the form

Registration link: https://bit.ly/2CP4HGK
